Welcome to the Resources page! Here you can find a collection of my blogs and articles focused on **data science**, **clinical data analysis**, and **statistics**.

---

## My Blogs

### [Data Digest: Clinical Analysis Newsletter](https://www.linkedin.com/newsletters/data-digest-clinical-analysis-7021396807893094400/)

A LinkedIn newsletter where I cover various topics related to clinical data analysis, statistical methodologies, and best practices in data science. Below are some of the blog posts published so far:

### Blog Posts

1. **[Apple Watch's New Features: Revolutionizing Clinical Saving](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/apple-watchs-new-features-revolutionizing-clinical-saving-divakaran-o9ntc)**
2. **[Drowning in Data: Mastering the Art of Clear & Concise Insights](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/drowning-data-mastering-art-clear-concise-insights-mahesh-divakaran-wr75c)**
3. **[AI Revolutionizing Healthcare: Rapid Changes Over the Last Decade](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/ai-revolutionizing-healthcare-rapid-changes-over-last-divakaran-jcdnc)**
4. **[Patient-Centric Approaches in Clinical Data Collection](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/patient-centric-approaches-clinical-data-collection-mahesh-divakaran-jakmc)**
5. **[Unlocking Insights: The Importance of ANOVA in Clinical Trials](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/unlocking-insights-importance-anova-clinical-trials-mahesh-divakaran-rharc)**
6. **[Ensuring Integrity in Regression Analysis: The Vital Role in Data](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/ensuring-integrity-regression-analysis-vital-role-data-divakaran-ynpoc)**
7. **[Pioneering Clinical Research: A Deep Dive into Sequential Models](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/pioneering-clinical-research-deep-dive-sequential-models-divakaran-xa0ic)**
8. **[Elevating Web Development with R Shiny and Beyond](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/elevating-web-development-r-shiny-beyond-mahesh-divakaran-w64gc)**
9. **[AI Revolution: Transforming the Landscape of Clinical Data](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/ai-revolution-transforming-landscape-clinical-data-mahesh-divakaran-qovoc)**
10. **[Navigating the Future: A 2024 Forecast of AI and Open-Source Data](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/navigating-future-2024-forecast-ai-open-source-data-mahesh-divakaran-budec)**

... and many more insightful articles on **[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/newsletters/data-digest-clinical-analysis-7021396807893094400/)**.

---

Stay tuned for more blog posts and updates! Be sure to follow my **[LinkedIn newsletter](https://www.linkedin.com/newsletters/data-digest-clinical-analysis-7021396807893094400/)** to receive the latest articles on clinical data analysis and data science.
